m,v = map(int, input().split())
a = [ 0 for i in range(3500)]
b = []
for i in range(m):
 d, l = map(int,input().split())
 b.append([d, l ])
b.sort()
#print(b)
for i in b:
 d = i[0]
 l = i[1]
 if a[d]+l<=v:
  a[d]+=l
 else:
  if a[d]>v:
   a[d+1]+=l
  else:
   total = a[d]+l
   a[d]=v
   a[d+1]+=total-v
ans = 0
for i in a:
 ans += min(i,v)
print(ans)
